events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, focusing on software development positions.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
We have completed the initial screening of your resume and experience; you meet the basic qualifications required.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 10 AM UTC; please prepare accordingly.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding skills.
Your HR interview is scheduled for April 15th at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your fit and motivation for the role.
We are pleased to propose you an offer to join us as a Software Engineer with a competitive salary and benefits package.
We received your positive feedback on the offer and your enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you onboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has commenced, including account setups, orientation schedules, and training materials.
The hiring process is now officially closed with your successful integration into the engineering team.
